Content:
Safely into the Northern Hemisphere motorcycle season is this celebration / event designed to highlight motorcycles as efficient transportation.

Many motorcycles can fit in the same space as a few cars and for carrying one or two souls around it is hard to beat their economy of space, resources, purchase and maintenance costs.

As a retiree, I suppose I will celebrate by riding a bike around the area and back home to my tinker shop.
Title: 33rd annual Ride To Work day - June 11, 2024
Author: Bitterroot Bugler
